headline: Ask HN: Do you miss the Bussiness Of Software forums?
description:
A crapload of years ago I used to lurk around the BoS forums. Like this HN community, I remember it being full of interesting topics and advice, all related to the world of selling software (first desktop software and lately SaaS) I even miss the term mISV.

Did you (the older of the place) participated in that forum? Do you know of similar sites still running?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你是否怀念Bussiness Of Software论坛？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你是否懷念Bussiness Of Software論壇？
description_zh-Hans:
几年前，我曾经潜伏在BoS论坛上。就像这个HN社区一样，我记得它充满了有趣的话题和建议，都与销售软件的世界有关（首先是桌面软件，最近是SaaS），我甚至怀念mISV这个词。

你（这个地方的老人）是否参加过那个论坛？你知道有类似的网站仍在运行吗？
description_zh-Hant:
幾年前，我曾經潛伏在BoS論壇上。就像這個HN社區一樣，我記得它充滿了有趣的話題和建議，都與銷售軟件的世界有關（首先是桌面軟件，最近是SaaS），我甚至懷念mISV這個詞。

你（這個地方的老人）是否參加過那個論壇？你知道有類似的網站仍在運行嗎？
